message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a special price. I think you'll really appreciate its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand you're looking to save, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $15000 for the product. How about we meet at $14000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I'm not willing to go below $14500, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about we meet at $14250?
I understand you're trying to meet me in the middle again, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
